attributes.action: Stop the news teams / journalists reporting Doom and Gloom forecasts on Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Sky News BBC News financial Markets
attributes.background: The news teams and journalists  are damaging our financial markets by reporting only Doom and Gloom on Brexit please stand together and unite as this will damage our future and our childrens future.If you want the best for good old Blighty then please sign.

rejection.details: These news organisations are editorially independent of government, and there is no provision for the Government to intervene in their day-to-day operations.
